import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-profilepage', templateUrl: './profilepage.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profilepage.component.scss'] }) export class ProfilepageComponent { showSpinners: boolean = true; ngOnInit() { // Set a timeout to hide the spinners after 5 seconds setTimeout(() => { this.showSpinners = false; }, 3000); } }
